name: Alexander's Therapy Session
description:
BEGIN LOG. 7/15/2022

CROORMEW : you're some omnipresent being spying on some kid in therapy.

CROORMEW : that's kinda weird, yknow.

CROORMEW : EHHHHH, whatever. i don't care.

CROORMEW : have fun, I guess

. . .

END LOG.

visual novel style game where the only thing you need to do is sit back, relax, and read! left click!

look through approximately 3(?) logs of awesome therapy goodness!

don't get too attached, though. you never know what could happen!

DEVELOPER'S NOTE :

hello there! its me, croormew! (Also known as : Jaden, Jay, "little lazy bitch".. thanks jenny.)

unfortunately(?), I've never been to therapy, so I dont know if this is realistic at all. if its not? weeeelllll...don't tell me! I'm not gonna fix it!

this game took so long to make, and honestly.. i know why. i was lazy. i kept taking breaks. bla bla bla..

i hope you enjoy this game despite its many possible flaws!

(oh, yeah, ignore the fact theres a CG "missing". i didn't feel like drawing that day.)
